markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Reef Heart](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1851)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Coral Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=20)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [coral armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=20)_, often favored by allies of [merfolk](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=73) and aquatic [elves](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=2), is made of living coral carefully harvested from the ocean depths. Legends speak of a variety of similar coral armors with distinct powers, but surface-dwellers know of _reef heart_ as a magic armor that makes it easier for them to travel under the sea. _Reef heart_ enables you to breathe underwater and gives you a swim Speed equal to half your land Speed.

**Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You cast [_coral eruption_](/Spells.aspx?ID=887). If you conjure the coral underwater, it ceases dealing damage after 1 minute, but its duration is unlimited. If the magical coral remains in place for 1 year, it becomes non-magical coral from which a reef might grow.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Restricted"
>
Reef Heart
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 2

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Restricted"
>
Reef Heart (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 2

</row>

</column>

---

The reef heart is _+2 greater resilient coral armor_, the swim Speed is equal to your full land Speed, and the _coral eruption_ is 7th level.
name: Reef Heart
